Name: [Revelation] Scattering Shot
Desc:
[Revelation Skill]
Arrows containing Malice chase down the targets. It first targets the enemy with the highest HP, and ignores enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
Consumes 35 MP, fires 6 arrows attacking at 155% Damage 4 times, and increases Damage on Normal monsters by 30%.
When an enemy takes damage from multiple arrows at the same time, final damage from the 2nd arrow decreases by 50%.
Cooldown: 6 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 35. Fires 6 arrows that attack at 155% Damage 4 times. Normal Monster Damage +30%.
If a single enemy is hit by multiple arrows, Final Damage -50% for each subsequent arrow after the first one.
Cooldown: 6 sec.
